LanguageData.DMS_MechLink.label: Cluster Transceiver
LanguageData.DMS_MechLink.description:
A man-made bionic implant that allows direct control of mechanoids. No one know if this is the early form of mechlinking or if it's a reverse engineered product of later generations. It functions as a regular mechlink when installed in a colonist.
Due to processing precision issues, these imitation mechlink devices from rim worlds often have installation side effects.
LanguageData.DMS_MechLink_Nerfed.label: Boid Controller
LanguageData.DMS_MechLink_Nerfed.description: A man-made bionic implant that allows direct control of mechanoids. This is a simplified version which is cheaper to manufacture and obtainable at a lower tech level. Due to limited production quality, it will fail and terminate after a while.
